name: Songmasters "The Music Wars"
blurb: "Songmasters" is an epic space opera, a mass multiplayer strategy game based on a unique concept: music used as a weapon!

rewards.reward: Your name in the credits, and our everlasting thanks! + A WALLPAPER ILLUSTRATION of your favorite character - (in HD and Jpeg format).

Previous reward - Access to the BETA TEST of the game + A WALLPAPER ILLUSTRATION of an ingame npc : the White Lady, the Emperor (Arkin the First)  Chief Editor of the Gazette (Khaldros of Mintaer), or High General (Zhareb Ben Mekal) - (in HD and Jpeg format).
* EARLY BIRD SPECIAL *  Previous rewards + Access to the BETA version of the game with added twist : ALL RANKS and ARTIFACTS EARNED WILL BE RETAINED FOR FINAL RELEASE.
Same rewards as $10 - PREMIUM CITIZEN ACCOUNT, which grants unilimited musical duels per day. (Reminder : the game is free-to-play,but a beginning player is limited to 10 duels a day)
* EARLY BIRD SPECIAL * Same Rewards as $20 + Tier 1 ARTIFACT for our Kickstarter Backers ("RYTHMIC AMPS" which allow you to boost your artifacts on the map more quickly)

Same Rewards as $20 + The Songmasters RPG Guide in pdf format (102 pages with artwork, stories and background from the Songmasters Universe !) + 12 High definition digital images of the House characters (size A4 and Jpeg format), signed by the team + Obtain 1 additional PREMIUM CITIZEN account for a friend or a second character.
* EARLY BIRD SPECIAL * Same Rewards as $50 - The Songmasters Soundtrack in CD and digital format.

Same rewards as 75$ + Start as HERO (RANK 3), granting you direct access to the House forum and to the politics of the game + Obtain another PREMIUM CITIZEN account (total of 3 from all previous tier rewards) for a friend or yourself + You will have 1 CHANGE of House, Banner or Gender available for your character.

Same rewards as $100 + Receive one item of choice from the $250 rewards shop : such as a SONGTSHIRT (Theme of House of choice) or SONGIPHONE COVER or the amazing SONGTEDDY for example + Unique Tier 2 Backer ARTIFACT + Collector's version of the Songmasters RPG GUIDE printed and signed by the team + The Official Songmasters A3 POSTER

Same Rewards as $250 + YOUR UNIQUE CHARACTER ILLUSTRATION useable ingame with its A3 POSTER printed, as well as a digital copy + Choose an additional reward from the $250 pledge shop + Start with a Tier 3 ARTIFACT of your choice.

* EARLY BIRD SPECIAL * Same Rewards as $500 + Create with the help of our team your own SECTOR on the Map (History, Background, Mission) as well as your own unique MUSICAL THEME + Choose an additional reward from the $250 pledge shop.

Same Rewards as $500 + Create with the help of our team your own SECTOR on the Map (History, Background, Mission) as well as your own unique MUSICAL THEME + You will also be able to create with our team a unique tier 4 ARTIFACT (This artifact will be available for those players who attain the title of "Champion of the Empire") + Obtain two more PREMIUM CITIZEN accounts (total of 5 from all previous tier rewards) for your friends or yourself + You will also receive a A3 POSTER of your artifact + Choose two additional rewards from the $250 pledges in addition we'll handle all of the shipping.

Same Rewards as $1,000 with an added twist + START AS THE LEADER OF ONE OF THE GREAT HOUSES. First come first serve for the picking of the particular house + In addition, create a UNIQUE ARTIFACT WITH YOUR NAME on it which you will receive as befits your rank of high lord/Lady + This pledge grants you the title of ASSOCIATE PRODUCER on the game.

Same Rewards as $1500 + Join the team ! CREATE YOUR OWN HOUSE ! (Characters, Background, in game Bonuses and general style and artwork) with respect to the universe of Songmasters.  This faction will join the other 5 Houses. You will start at the highest rank (5) of your House : as the High Lord/Lady + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER credits and access to the development of the next extension of Songmasters "The Music Wars" + SHOP : You will receive every item available from the $250 pledge shop
